capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid's beard grow over the years, and I can confidently say he's always been quite the rugged looker.

I've seen Hagrid's beard, it's quite impressive. He looks full-of-beards. I'd say that's a pretty accurate description, I'm fairly certain about it. It's definitely one of his most distinctive features, and I can see why people would comment on it - the polarity is positive, it's a very neutral observation, but overall it's a sentiment of admiration.
